attributes.action: Ingore Any Calls to 'Metricify' speed limits, road signs and anything else.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should we all have to adapt to using different measurements just because the EU says so? For this one I utter the old saying "If It Ain't Broke Don't Fix It"

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
